Reviews.Title: Sony Alpha NEX-7  the Future of Quality Photagraphy has arrived!
Reviews.Author: Paul B. Gulick "Paul B. Gulick"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera and the package is an exceptional value.  The Sony NEX-7 is small an light but gives professional quality pictures/video. Easy to operate and has every feature anyone needs to control the creative production of beautiful pictures. Like guns, you will use the camera you have on you and this one is easy to take everywhere. A friend who knows cameras and completely understands photography agreed this is the one to get for retired people who travel around in an Airstream trailer exploring the wonderful U.S.A. and he was correct.
